name: User make double click on Folder
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.
- Create new folder.

### Verify that:

- User opens a folder with a double click on it.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project via API.
  • Create new folder.

Verify that:

  • User opens a folder with a double click on it.

Call log:
  - waiting for locator("button:has(p[title=\"New Folder 1\"]:text(\"New Folder 1\"))")

Note: Playwright Timeout. Element not found or action took too long.
